content: Young musicians inspired by Elton John include which British singer-songwriter who collaborated with him on the song 'Tiny Dancer' at the Grammy Awards?

I believe the British singer-songwriter you're referring to is Ed Sheeran. In 2014, at the Grammy Awards, Ed Sheeran performed a tribute to Elton John, covering his iconic song 'Tiny Dancer.' This performance was a significant moment, showcasing Sheeran's admiration and influence from Elton John's work.
